sentence.Network_en: The soldiers were engaged in a military operation close to the Ugandan border.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些士兵参加了乌干达边境附近的一次军事行动。

sentence.Network_en: A second assault team took out off - duty terrorists and Ugandan guards.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一突击组从车上跳下来,跑过40码到建筑物前的人行道并快速进去消灭了所有的抵抗.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, just 1,600 Ugandan troops have shown up.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 仅1600名乌干达维和士兵出现.

list.abs: editorials in ugandan newspapers called on the government formally to deny the existence of jinn .乌干达报纸的社论正式向政府呼吁，要求它否认精灵的存在。
with loans from root capital , members of the ugandan cooperative unex can bring their coffee to market .有了草根资本提供的贷款，乌干达合作社unex的成员们就可以把他们的咖啡带入市场。

entry.tran: 乌干达的；乌干达人的；乌干达文化的
entry.def: Ugandan means belonging or relating to Uganda or to its people or culture.
A Ugandan is a Ugandan citizen, or a person of Ugandan origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Uganda
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Uganda or its people;
